Description: Sherd from the body of a jar; sandy brown ware with occasional flecks of mica and a grey core; exterior covered with a flaking red paint or slip on which is a radiate stripe design painted in black
Bibliographic references: Reade & Burleigh 1978a / The 'Ali cemetery: old excavations, ivory and radiocarbon dating (pl. 34b)
Nayeem M A 1992a / Bahrain (329; fig. 18, top right)
Mackay E 1929a / Bahrein and Hemamieh (pl. VI inset, lower)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
